rooms.description: A welcoming entry area that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the positive energy flow.
Spacious open-plan living space with natural light and a view towards the front yard. Designed to promote interaction in line with Vastu guidelines.
A dining area adjacent to the living room, following traditional layout norms.
Fully functional kitchen with proper ventilation and adherence to safety norms as per local building codes.
Primary bedroom with a spacious balcony providing an open view and fresh air, following Vastu recommendations for the master room.
Secondary bedroom with a balcony, offering privacy and natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Well-ventilated bathroom designed for comfort and hygiene.
Two-car garage integrated with the ground floor layout to accommodate vehicles and storage.
